cause.description:
As many of you know, I help support/promote DarkCrux Clothing. Well a good friend of mine was recently diagnosed with meningitis. I personally, am not all that familiar with the effects of meningitis, but I know it is a serious matter. So I've decided to start this cause to try and raise money for both causes. DarkCrux is a new(ish) clothing company and they need money to spread their ideas to everyone else. By donating to this cause, not only will you help millions with meningitis, but you'll also help a local man achieve his dream of his clothing companies success. 50% (or more) of your donation will be sent to local hospitals and other surrounding states for meningitis, and the other half will go towards new merchandise for DarkCrux. Once again, I would really appreciate any amount.
Thank You,
Jeremy W.
1. DarkCrux
2. Meningitis.
cause.mission: Raise money for meningitis and merch.
cause.name: DarkCrux Fund
